channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Running the Tao Te Ching - 2
item.description: When runners see some runs as beautiful other runs become ugly When runners see some runs as good other runs become bad Running and non-running create each other Difficult and easy runs support each other Long and short runs define each other A runner’s highs and lows depend on each other The time before and after running follow each other Therefore the Master runs without doing anything and instructs without saying anything
